data: Respondents were asked if using their usual language, they had difficulty communicating, for example, understanding or being understood. Respondents who had "some" or "a lot" difficulty or could not communicate at all were classified as having difficulty communicating.

caption3: Respondents were asked if using their usual language, they had difficulty communicating, for example, understanding or being understood. Respondents who had "some" or "a lot" difficulty or could not communicate at all were classified as having difficulty communicating.
